news_title: New Research Reveals How Eclipse's SVM Challenges Single-Threaded Ethereum Rollups
news_subtitle: Eclipse combines Solana's parallel execution with Ethereum settlement, challenging single-threaded L2 design as Cointelegraph Research examines architectural trade-offs.

news_title: Ethereum Sets TPS Record Ahead of Fusaka Upgrade
news_subtitle: Layer-2 activity, led by Lighter’s high TPS, pushed Ethereum to a new 32,950 TPS network throughput record. Gas limit expansion to 60M and upcoming PeerDAS boost scalability, lowering costs and increasing data capacity. Fusaka adds security upgrades and passkey support, enhancing...

news_title: Crypto Treasury Stocks Rebound Led by Ether-Focused Companies
news_subtitle: Ethereum News Digital asset treasury stocks surged Tuesday as crypto markets recovered from early December selling pressure. Ether treasury companies led the gains, with several posting double-digit percentage increases as Ethereum rebounded from recent lows. Nasdaq-listed Ethere...

news_title: UK’s New Digital Asset Act Redefines Property Rights For Crypto Holders
news_subtitle: The UK has formally rewritten centuries of property law with the Property (Digital Assets etc) Act 2025, creating a brand-new third category of personal property specifically for cryptocurrencies, stablecoins, and other digital assets. The legislation received Royal Assent on Dec...

news_title: Ethereum Hits New All-Time High for TPS Ahead of Fusaka Upgrade
news_subtitle: The Ethereum ecosystem has set a new record for transactions per second. Combined activity across Ethereum and all its Layer 2 networks reached 32,950 TPS, passing last week’s high of 31,000. This increase comes ahead of today’s launch of the Fusaka upgrade, which is expected to ...
